resources.string: This project is an android application implementation of the web-app Healthiness Of Data. Click the button below to visit the official site.

This view calculates various aggregates - minimum found value, maximum value, standard deviation, mean, coverage and distribution of data. Bins text field equals to number of histogram bars on the chart.

This view searches for outliers in the queried dataset. Outliers are values that are most likely a machine or human error, values that do not behave like the given dataset. Threshold input is the cutoff value of data probability in a given point similiar to Gauss distribution.
